auth_config.name: api_key
auth_config.label: API Key
auth_config.message: This API key will be used for accessing APIs.

max_tokens.text: The maximum number of tokens to generate. Default: 2048

mode.text: Code generation mode. This could be Python, Java, SQL, etc. Allowed values: python, java, javascript, go, php, js_regex

model.text: The language model to use. Allowed value: icortex-1. Default: icortex-1

n.text: The number of outputs to generate. Default: 1

temperature.text: The sampling temperature to be used in text generation. The higher the temperature, the higher the risk of the output to sound 'made up'. Default: null

meta.description: Generate code for a given programming language

context.text: The tables to use in a SQL query.

max_tokens.text: The maximum number of tokens to generate. Default: 2048

model.text: The language model to use. Allowed value: icortex-1. Default: icortex-1

n.text: The number of outputs to generate. Default: 1

temperature.text: The sampling temperature to be used in text generation. The higher the temperature, the higher the risk of the output to sound 'made up'. Default: null

meta.description: Generate SQL queries given table descriptions

description.text: The description of the product or service.

formality.text: The formality of the generated text, for languages that support it. Allowed values: default, more, less, prefer_more, prefer_less

keywords.text: Keywords to include in the ad.

max_tokens.text: The maximum number of tokens to generate. Default: 2048

mode.text: The platform, e.g. 'facebook' to generate a Facebook ad. Allowed values: general, facebook, linkedin

model.text: The language model to use. Allowed values: sophos-1, chat-sophos-1, claude-haiku, claude-sonnet, claude-3-haiku, claude-3-sonnet, claude-3-5-sonnet, mistral-small, mistral-large. Default: claude-3-haiku

n.text: The number of outputs to generate. Default: 1

name.text: The name of the product or service.

promotion.text: The promotion for the product or service.

source_lang.text: The language of the source text. Available options are: 'en': English (Default), 'auto': The API will attempt to detect the language of the text and translate it, 'ar': Arabic, 'bg': Bulgarian, 'cs': Czech, 'da': Danish, 'de': German, 'el': Greek, 'es': Spanish, 'et': Estonian, 'fi': Finnish, 'fr': French, 'hu': Hungarian, 'id': Indonesian, 'it': Italian, 'ja': Japanese, 'ko': Korean, 'lt': Lithuanian, 'lv': Latvian, 'nb': Norwegian, 'nl': Dutch, 'pl': Polish, 'pt': Portuguese (all Portuguese varieties mixed), 'ro': Romanian, 'ru': Russian, 'sk': Slovak, 'sl': Slovenian, 'sv': Swedish, 'tr': Turkish, 'uk': Ukrainian, 'zh': Chinese

target_lang.text: The language which the text should be generated in. Available options are: 'ar': Arabic, 'bg': Bulgarian, 'cs': Czech, 'da': Danish, 'de': German, 'el': Greek, 'en': Alias for en-us, 'en-gb': English (British), 'en-us': English (American), 'es': Spanish, 'et': Estonian, 'fi': Finnish, 'fr': French, 'hu': Hungarian, 'id': Indonesian, 'it': Italian, 'ja': Japanese, 'ko': Korean, 'lt': Lithuanian, 'lv': Latvian, 'nb': Norwegian, 'nl': Dutch, 'pl': Polish, 'pt': Alias for pt-pt, 'pt-br': Portuguese (Brazilian), 'pt-pt': Portuguese (all Portuguese varieties excluding Brazilian Portuguese), 'ro': Romanian, 'ru': Russian, 'sk': Slovak, 'sl': Slovenian, 'sv': Swedish, 'tr': Turkish, 'uk': Ukrainian, 'zh': Chinese (simplified)
